context: The Finnish word 'unelma' means dream or aspiration. It is a noun that can refer to both night dreams and life goals/aspirations. The word has different forms in different cases - for example, 'unelmanen' would be the genitive form meaning 'of a dream', and 'unelmia' is partitive form meaning 'dreams'. When used with verbs likeolla (to have), it's commonly said 'minulla on unelma' (I have a dream).
